tool_description: Free and Open source GPS Tracking Platform. This is the API Platform to provide easy integration and no need IP public servers to run your own platform. Open source hosted on gitlab, https://gitlab.com/elyez, customize as your needs. Free your soul and business from vendor locked system now.
name: Elyez - Free Open Source GPS Tracking
title: Elyez - Free Open Source GPS Tracking
tool_name: Elyez - Free Open Source GPS Tracking

api_list.name: List Devices

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: fuzzy search device id or plate/name

api_list.name: List Geofences

optional_parameters.name: bbox
optional_parameters.description: Search by bbox (minLng, minLat, maxLng, maxLat)

api_list.name: All Devices

optional_parameters.name: moving
optional_parameters.description: Filter moving (speed > 0) or stopped (speed = 0), default: null

optional_parameters.name: input
optional_parameters.description: Advanced filter with INPUT sensors conditions (— = any), ex: --1--0--

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Advanced filter OUTPUT conditions (— = any), ex: --1--0--

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Filter data with tracking time newer than this (format: ISO timestamp). ex: 2017-01-31T14:53:48Z

api_list.name: List Webhooks
Events
api_list.description: List all tracking events (alerts), id and name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://elyez.p.rapidapi.com/tracking/events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "elyez.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
